# status()

**Instance Method**

Allows the merchant to check the status of the Store and Forward session.

## Declaration

```swift
func status() async throws -> StoreAndForwardStatus
```

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.ProximityReader/documentation/ProximityReader/StoreAndForwardStatus] when successful.
